main.name: Bharath Krishna
main.bio: I am an Application Engineer with total 9+ years of experience. I mainly build backend services using Python, Golang in Kubernetes environments. Has knowledge of React and its frameworks to build UI applications also.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.
